pg004_services.title: IT Business
pg004_services.desc: We provide comprehensive IT services across a wide range of fields, primarily focusing on finance, insurance, public sector, and social infrastructure, from business applications to infrastructure construction, cloud services, and network operations.
fields: 【Industries】
Finance: Banks, Trust Banks, Securities, Credit Cards
Insurance: Life Insurance, Non-life Insurance, Mutual Aid Schemes
Public: Integrated Administrative Operations, Welfare, Standardization Compliance, Next-gen DX
Infrastructure: Cloud (AWS·Azure), Server Construction, Network
Other: Communications, Embedded Systems (Vehicle-mounted·IoT), SAP, Salesforce
【System Types】
Open Systems, Mainframe, Android, iOS
【Development Technologies】
Java, C#, .NET, Typescript, Python, Cobol, C/C++
Intra-mart, RPA, Ab Initio
AWS/Azure, Unix/Linux, Windows, General-purpose Machine Environment Setup, Network Construction

pg004_services.title: Real Estate Business
pg004_services.desc: While our IT business is the core, we are also broadly expanding into the real estate sector, including sales, construction, and leasing, with an eye on its growth.

Construction/Development
Leasing of Investment Properties like Stores
